articles.author: Morgan Petronelli, Managing Editor
articles.title: Preterm infant HRQOL: Long-term impacts and determinants - Contemporary Obgyn
articles.description: A recent study was highlighted at the 2023 American Academy of Pediatrics National Conference & Exhibition that shed light on the long-term impact of very preterm birth on the health-related quality of life (HRQOL) of infants and identified key determinants.
articles.content:
Takeaways
  • Very preterm birth negatively impacts infant health-related quality of life (HRQOL) for up to a year after discharge from the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU).
  • The HRQOL… [+4503 chars]
